Just so you know…

Provisional ISSNs versus confirmed ISSNs

At DOAJ, we insist that the ISSN for your journal is fully registered and confirmed at the time you submit an application to us. DOAJ does not allow provisional ISSNs. Learn more

Support

Supporters

Many organisations support DOAJ with an annual payment to fund our essential work. Some donors are able to commit larger amounts of funding, which has a greater impact on DOAJ’s future and allows for more sustainable development. A number of organisations committed to a sustainable funding model as recommended by SCOSS (this funding initiative ran from 2018 to 2020).

Current supporters

  • Australia

    Australian Catholic University

    Annual Sustainable

  • Norway

    Nord University

    Annual Sustainable

  • Canada

    University of Alberta Libraries: Bibliothèque Saint-Jean

    Part of the CRKN (Canadian Research Knowledge Network)

    Annual Sustainable

  • Germany

    Universitätsbibliothek Passau

    Part of the Bayern Konsortium

    Annual

  • Hungary

    Corvinus University of Budapest

    Part of the Hungarian Library Consortium

    Annual
